attributes.action: see more emphasis on renewable energy by Geothermal methods.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It seems that the only alternative to renewable energy at present is Nuclear or Wind power. It might be a good idea to look at Geothermals. Once tapped into, it's free, it's clean and it's constantly renewable. Geothermal - heat from the earth crust.
